nodes.text: Zord's Atmosphere Baths was a location on the planet of Formos.

The Atmosphere Baths was a spa on Formos where visitors could relax in a steam bath. Visitors of many species came to the spa, including N'Mrith, who appreciated the steam bath, as it reminded him of his home.

When Han Solo and Chewbacca visited the world on a smuggling run, their contact, N'Mrith, advised them to meet him at the location, as Imperial troops were patrolling the streets, looking out for suspicious behavior.
The two smugglers met N'Mrith as planned, but did not enjoy the therapeutic conditions in the spa.
